name: Tayla martin
coverLetter: Hello my name is tayla,24 and my boyfriends,26 name is richie. We have 5 years experience and I can do up to 3 pounds of outdoor a day and my boyfriends could be sold as indoor. We can provide our own food and have our own bus to stay in. We are very knowledgable in all jobs at the farm. We also can make bubble hash and can provide our own bags. Willing to work as much as possible and can start whenever. Need help? Look no furthur just give us the call.
